text: Save the children is a very worthwhile charity. The amount of your payment while small to you would be important to them
I agree I think it is a wonderful charity.
A small donation will help them in their work
Will you be donating to this charity?
I will definitely donate
I would considering donating, if you donate. Do you have a number in mind?
I plan to donate 2.00
I was thinking more along the lines of 1.00
Any amount will help although I think a higher donation would make you feel good
I feel pretty good about 1.00. Between the two of us that's 3 bucks.
That's true. But really one additional dollar will be more meaningful than you could imagine
Fine fine, they can have the 2 bucks
That's great. You are paying it forward today. Hope you have a wonderful day
Yes you to, I guess we are done?
I believe so although the instructions say we each need to have 10 replies
Are you having a good morning?
Yes. So far. How about you?
Pretty good, warm morning in Michigan today.
In North Carolina here. Sunny and 70
Alright you have a great day, and send that 2 bucks.
Will do. You too
